MacIntuneManifest.Name: CIS Level 2 - Terminal Secure Keyboard Entry
MacIntuneManifest.Description: Enables Secure Keyboard Entry for Terminal application to prevent keylogging and input monitoring. This CIS Level 2 security baseline control sets SecureKeyboardEntry to true, protecting sensitive command-line inputs from being captured by other applications or processes. Critical for protecting administrative credentials and sensitive data entered in Terminal sessions.
